remarks: The size of a subset of a finite set is less than the size of the containing set.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)  TODO (NM): usage (2 times) should be replaced by ~ hashss , and ~ hashssle should be deleted afterwards.
statement: hashssle $p |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ B C_ A ) -> ( # ` B ) <_ ( # ` A ) ) $.
